summary: 2003 AUDI A4 3.0 QUATTRO.  THE CAR HAS PROBLEM WITH OUTSIDE MIRRORS.  BOTH MIRRORS AREN'T ADJUST TO ITS POSITION THAT IS SET IN MEMORY.  EVERYTIME THE CAR WAS USED BY MY SPOUSE, I HAVE TO MANUALLY READJUST BOTH MIRROS INSTEAD OF AUTOMATICALLY ADJUST BY WHAT WAS PROGRAMMED IN MEMORY.   MORE OVER, THE DRIVER OUTSIDE MIRROR JUST CHANGE IT POSITION AFTER 1 OR 2 DAYS OF DRIVING.    IT IS VERY SCARY AND UNSAFE I FEEL EVERYTIME WHEN I DRIVE THE CAR WITH A WORRY THAT THE MIRROR ISN'T IN ITS POSITION THAT I SET.
